title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a colorful medley of fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.

title: Classic Beef Burgers
summary: Juicy beef patties served on toasted buns with fresh lettuce, tomato, and your favorite toppings.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect for any occasion.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.
